B2 a stupid person or someone who is behaving in a stupid way: Some idiot left the tap running in the bathroom and there's water everywhere. [ as form of address ] You stupid idiot - that's a month's work you've lost! Synonyms
half-wit disapproving
imbecile
moron informal
More examplesFewer examplesSome idiot almost knocked me off my bike this morning.I just stood there gaping like an idiot - I didn't know what to say.I wish politicians wouldn't talk down to us as if we were idiots.You're acting like a complete idiot! Have you no sense?Any idiot with a basic knowledge of French should be able to book a hotel room in Paris.
